articles.title: Red Sox ace Garrett Crochet weighs in on Lucas Giolito’s ongoing free agency
articles.description:
Giolito opted out of his deal with the Red Sox after a strong 2025, but hasn't landed a new contract yet.

The post Red Sox ace Garrett Crochet weighs in on Lucas Giolito’s ongoing free agency appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lucas Giolito opted out of his Red Sox contract after a strong 2025 season.
Garrett Crochet comments on Giolito's free agency status amid ongoing negotiations.
Giolito's situation affects Red Sox's roster decisions for the upcoming season.
